sources.description:
Run Convict-Run for the Sun- ...The Cry is Escape Now or Die!
A bloody riot provides a cunning inmate with the opportunity to break out of his South American prison.

Original title: Med mord i bagaget & Edited from M찾os Sangrentas (1955)

Available with subtitles in many language options

Directors: Carlos Hugo Christensen, Jerry Warren

00:00 Full Movie
01:13 Criminal activities in Panama involving international criminals and military personnel lead to tension and conflict.
04:57 Psychologist called in to address increasing violence among prisoners, but doubts arise about his qualifications and effectiveness.
07:38 Intense discussion between a doctor and a visitor about prison conditions and policies.
10:03 Understanding the impact of the environment on mental health, the responsibility of personnel, and the need for reevaluation of perceptions.
16:03 Escape plan executed, weapons secured, and a long-awaited moment.
21:32: Tensions rise as characters discuss money, freedom, and a looming threat. A quick escape is planned as danger approaches.
34:44 Tension rises as a group faces threats and betrayal while pursuing their target.
